TopicTitle: Is Mun surface supposed to be this dark? (SVT)

Articles.Content:
Is the Mun's surface supposed to be this dark with Stock Visual Terrain? It's nearing noon (note the solar panels) but the surface is almost completely black. I'm also running PlanetShine and Stock Visual Enhancements (including Environmental Visual Effects and Scatterer), SVT was my most recent addition, and when I saw a big change.

Thanks!

http://imgur.com/cvvXqto

hi my friend do not try to add questions or try asking for any thing no one even bother what is your problem unless you have high reputation 

i have asking for problem which  i have with heat passing trough heat shield ( in real solar system) and i can not play for over near 2 weeks because of this and no one have ever answered my question this is one of worst community at least in modding part i have ever seen

and about your problem i think that is normal it's not that dark the dark side of a planet should be even darker but that is what i think it could be wrong 

try seeing some picture from mod you are using in net and compare them and see if there is any differences 

good luck on space 

 

Edited January 18, 2017 by Ninadragonborn
